archimate:BusinessRole.name: AARM2 Exception Approver
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: The "Exception Approver" is an active structure element that represents the role responsible for evaluating and making decisions on requests that involve potential Segregation of Duties (SoD) violations. This role is authorized to assess the risks and possible justifications for granting exceptions to standard SoD policies, ensuring that any adjustments to user roles adhere to the organization's compliance standards and security requirements.
